item.title: How to use Jekyll Docker container
item.description: Jekyll’s Docker Container with Demo Content and demo site. Plugins included: - Jekyll: 3.8.3 -- jekyll-paginate -- jekyll-sitemap -- jekyll-feed -- jekyll-multisite -- jekyll-github-metadata -- jekyll-seo-tag -- jekyll-watch -- jekyll-sass-converter -- jekyll-assets -- jekyll-multiple-languages-plugin - Compass: 1.0.3 - NodeJS: 8.9.3 -- NPM: 5.5.1 -- Yarn: 1.3.2 The first of all: Install Docker: On Linux Ubuntu/Debian: https://docs.docker.com/install/linux/docker-ce/ubuntu/ https://docs.docker.com/install/linux/docker-ce/debian/ On MacOS: https://docs.docker.com/docker-for-mac/install/ On Windows: https://docs.
